Primary Contact: Amanda Barrett, Manager of Residential Services; Phone: 778.436.9476; Email: amanda.barrett@jhscso.bc.ca
Service Details: Provides seven units (shared accommodation) of low cost housing for adult men (19+) who are able to maintain independent living
How to Apply: Please download the Supportive Housing Registration (SHR) Service form from our website and fax completed form to BC Housing’s Penticton office at 250.492.1080. You can also scan/email the application to their Health and Housing Coordinator, Ana Frias at interiorregion@bchousing.org.
